scripts.check: npm ci && npx eslint "src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx}" --fix && npx prettier --write "src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,md,css}" && (npm audit fix || true) && npx vite build
scripts.deploy: if [ -n "$GH_TOKEN" ]; then curl -sSf -X POST -H "Accept: application/vnd.github+json" -H "Authorization: token $GH_TOKEN" https://api.github.com/repos/pargame/MyBlog/actions/workflows/deploy.yml/dispatches -d '{"ref":"main"}' && echo 'Dispatched deploy.yml'; else echo 'GH_TOKEN not set. Set GH_TOKEN (PAT with workflow/repo scope) to trigger remote deploy.'; fi
